title: One POSSIBLE SOLUTION to the mail duplicated in 2 accounts
content:
It was barely noticable, but SERVER NAME in Server Settings was the same for both accounts. These were Yahoo IMAP accounts. Each account had its own folder in Users / ....... / ImapMail, but both accounts were pointing to one folder. Corrected this in the SERVER NAME field in Server Settings (see image)

"SHOULD" solve the issue .......... particulary it is THE ONLY item I can find that was not normal.
creator: mminieri

In 128.0 version, I can see only 128.0.1esr and 128.1.0esr. Is there no normal updates? Now only esr is supproted?

I had version 115.0 installed but I was able to upgrade to 128.1.0esr without any issue. Is this supported?

Regards, Asif

title: My Thunderbird Stopped Working Since Infected by 'tsdtocl.com' also called 'Punchbowl Scam'
content:
I tried to open a 'Punchbowl evite' from a friend, but was required to 'log into my email server again through the evite portal.' RED FLAG. I (stupidly) did, or tried to. The evite never opened, but the friend who appeared to have sent it said her email had been hacked and her whole address book had been receiving these 'Punchbowl evites.' This is an infection or phishing, which has disabled my Thunderbird. Even when I try to read an old AOL email already downloaded to my computer by Thunderbird, this fake AOL log-in page pops up, but at the top it says 'https://tsdtocl.com/'. I tried changing my direct AOL password. I tried blocking this website on Google Chrome using the 'Block Site' extension. Neither had any effect. Thunderbird is still locked out of my AOL, and the fake AOL website keeps popping up.

I would appreciate any advice you can offer.

creator: rocha.rogerio.p

title: Problema Download Email no IMAP no Servidor Skymail
content:
Bom Dia, Após eu migrar para o servidor da empresa Skymail, estou tendo problemas em sincronizar algumas contas em IMAP, no qual o Thunderbird não consegue organizar os emails e ele corrompe a visualização do mesmo. No Webmail ele está normal e não tenho problemas com acesso ao mesmo. Coincidência ou não, mas os emails que estão dando este problema são os emails que tem mais de 80Gb. O que eu fiz para ver se melhoraria, era dividir em pastas dos emails por ano, para diminuir o tamanho da ocupação do email, mas não resolveu. No primeiro momento, logo quando implantei, eles pediram para modificar esta configuração:

Editar → Preferências → Avançado → Geral → Editor de Config. Siga o procedimento: Localize uma chave chamada: mailnews.customDBHeaders Mude-a para: Received Após isso reinicie o aplicativo --> Clique com o botão direito na pasta e vá em Propriedades --> Reparar Pasta

Isso deu certo por alguns dias, mas depois começou a ter problemas e mesmo reparando a pasta, mas não adianta. O que eles me alegaram era uma questão de leitura do Thunderbird a data do email no servidor deles, mas continuo com o problema. Eles meio que "lavaram" as mãos, já que no servidor deles está ok e pediram para testar em outro cliente de email. Alguém já passou por este problema? Anexo está a imagem de como fica o email, ficam vários com a data que eu pedi para reparar, mas vazio. Eu já atualizei para a última versão do Thunderbird, mas ainda continua assim.
creator: fernando63

I have tried Import from another Thunderbird installation, Profile folder Open the back upp and Select Profiles Tick Mail messages. title: Thunderbird
content:
Ik gebruik al jaren Thunderbird, en heb diverse keren netjes een financiële bijdrage gegeven. Echter heb ik een groot probleem, en hoop dat u nu iets voor mij kunt betekenen. Ik heb bij provider Telfort(KPN) een mailadres [verwijderd] Nu is mijn computer gecrasht, en moet ik Thunderbird opnieuw installeren. Echter word er een "wachtwoord" gevraagd, en heb ik deze volgens mij nooit ingevuld, c.q. kan deze niet vinden. Uiteraard zou ik graag een nieuw wachtwoord willen aanmaken, MAAR KRIJG DEZE KEUZE NIET!!! Ik heb in Thunderbird heel veel zaken gearchiveerd, en zou het verschrikkelijk vinden als ik deze niet meer kan terughalen. Kunt u mij alstublieft hiermee helpen, zodat ik "mijn" Thunderbird weer terug krijg! Bij voorbaat dank!

P.s. Dat wachtwoord, moet dat het wachtwoord zijn van je mailprovider, in dit geval Telfort(KPN) of kan dit gewoon een verzonnen wachtwoord zijn (dan weet ik deze niet meer)
creator: ruud.laurs

title: DAV connection to Nextcloud results in error 401
content:
Dear support, I have set up a Nextcloud with a calendar that is already synchronizing via DAVx5 to my mobile phone via a dyn-dns-domain. Also the DAV connection to Thunderbird works if I use my LAN IP to contact the (local) nextcloud server.

However, if I want to use the dyn-dns-domain (that works with DAVx5 on my mobile phone), I get error 401. Via e.g. Firefox I can log on to the nextcloud via the dyn-dns-domain as well without issues. Nextcloud is set up as part of a docker service behind a SWAG reverse proxy (that is bypassed when using the LAN IP approach as that goes directly to the Nextcloud docker container), but as the configuration works with the DAVx5 on my mobile phone, I am not sure how Thunderbird would try to get access any different. Is there a way in Thunderbird to see details on the exchange to the server to see where the issue comes from? That might at least provide some more information what could be the difference between DAVx5 and Thunderbird. Thanks for any hint on how I can identify the problem.
creator: MN

title: Thunderbird is newly SLOW
content:
I've been a Thunderbird user for years. I have no idea what they changed recently, but it's incredibly, incredibly SLOW, almost to the point of unusability. Even something as simple as deleting emails.

I usually do these in chunks -- select multiples and delete. We're not talking about hundreds of emails at at time here, just maybe 5-15. Select them all, hit delete, and it should take just a couple of seconds to delete the messages. It did, in the past. But lately, it's taking so long that I could leave and make a sandwich, and when I come back, maybe it will be done. Maybe it will still be working, though, or maybe it will have locked up because it was taking so long.

It's pretty difficult to get work done at this rate.
creator: a2jc4life

title: Gmail will not finalise setup of new gmail email on thunderbird. get "400" error message.
content:
Dear Community I have had an gmail account on thunderbird for years. In/outbox etc details were still on thunderbird but when checking account details in Thunderbird all info was there as normal.... but.. in "View password"..there was no details at all for this gmail account - but were there for other accounts.

Went to the gmail app and tried login...my email and password are correct...login was ok. I deleted the gmail account from thunderbird and tried to to do "New, Email Account." and entered my gmail account details correctly and hit Done when green gmail 'configuration" is "found".

Then I get a google window to sign into my gmail email account - it has correct email address shown.. I enter correct password and get this message.

"400 Thats an error... The server cannot process the request because its malformed. It should not be retried. Thats all we know"

Thunderbird email setup then shows a yellow box that says "wrong configuration... etc"

Checked in gmail settings and imap is ticked - pop is not. Also checked Gmail "Connections to third party apps and services" and Thunderbird was enabled in April 2021.

Does someone have a fix for this?? or... where have I gone wrong?? Cheers M.

title: Thunderbird 128.1.0esr - "Failed to send message. Error sending message. The mail server responded: spam id=155817::1723829084-40E2144E-91888C35/29/1527808. Please check the message and try again."
content:
Thunderbird no longer sends emails from my standard account. Receiving continues to work without any problems. The provider is Vodafone with the .kabelmail.de address Screenshots show the settings. Otherwise these always worked. I've already set the TLS version to 1 in Thunderbird, without success.

The error message can be seen in German on the other screenshot and means in English:

"Failed to send message. Error sending message. The mail server responded: spam id=155817::1723829084-40E2144E-91888C35/29/1527808. Please check the message and try again."

title: Can't see contents of email on Thunderbird since newest update
content:
Hello, we are running Thunderbird 128.1.0osr (32-bit) released on 8/6/24. Ever since the upgrade my husband's email has not worked correctly.

Around that same time, he received a pop up within the Thunderbird app asking for donations from Thunderbird. The popup would not go away and my husband lost a ton of his email.

Ever since these two events his Thunderbird email won't work correctly.

Messages since 8/4/24 at 6:32 am DO work correctly. Emails prior to 5/6/23 also work correctly. Any message in the time period from 5/6/23 at 11:26 am to 8/4/24 does NOT work correctly.

We are having the same trouble with the sent items folder.

We use a third party email that we import into Thunderbird and have used the third party email and Thunderbird since at least 2020 and never had this problem.

We can see all the message headers in our email list, but when we click on the email, nothing shows up. It will briefly say "message loading" at the bottom corner, but the email is totally blank. Furthermore, the message that peeks out at the bottom is the last email that we clicked on from the section of emails that does work. It is not changing to the email we are actually clicking on.

For example: lets say we have an email with message header "thank you for your order" received on 8/15. We click into that and it pulls up fine.

Then we go into older email from 7/31. The message header is "hurry sale ends today". If we click on that, it will say "message loading" at the bottom corner. However, the message preview at the bottom of the screen still displays the from/to/subject from the previous email we viewed from 8/15 "thank you for your order" (the message from 8/15 shows as blank though).

Even if we double click the message from 7/31 that we are trying to view, it just pulls up a blank screen. The bar at the top will briefly display the correct message title that we are trying to open, then it just blanks out.

Steps we have taken:

1. In Account Settings/Privacy I clicked to "allow remote content". This made an improvement as prior to this we were having the same problem even with recent messages. We could see one or two messages that had just arrived, then the third message we couldn't see. We have messages set to delete on the server after so many days. So I think it was able to recover the message that were still on the remove 3rd party server.

2. We moved a lot of the emails into archive folders as I thought the inbox may be too large. That didn't make any improvement.

Thanks for any help you can provide. My husband has a lot of really important information in his emails that he needs.
creator: lexi

creator: garybeb

title: frequent freezes/lock-ups in Thunderbird
content:
Hi,

I'm a long-time user and big fan of T-Bird, but I've been having an issue lately that is driving me nuts.

When using T-Bird, the program frequently locks up for maybe 10-30 seconds, especially when deleting messages, transferring messages to folders, and when downloading new messages. This is super frustrating because it's hard to get much done when your critical software is frequently locking up the entire system.

This happens on all three of my PCs (two workstations and a laptop); two are Win 10, one is Win 11, and this problem is not happening with any other software. I've looked at the task manager when it happens and killed any processes that are taking more than a negligible amount of CPU, but that doesn't fix the problem.

It's hard to know exactly where T-Bird is getting hung up without the right profiling tools, but it seems to happen most frequently when accessing the network. At first I thought it might be a disk space issue, but it's still happening on all the machines even after optimizing the disks and deleting the recycle bin, temporary files, etc. to ensure there's plenty of free disk space.

The only thing I've tried that seems to help a little bit is turning off the quick filter.

I've tried asking support at my ISP (InMotion) if the delay might be caused by the mail server, but sadly they are a bunch of worthless idiots.

Any advice or feedback on how we might narrow down or fix this is much appreciated! :)

thanks in advance...

-B
creator: old11
